channel.title: American composer
channel.description:
Original works by American composers commissioned for this series. The compositions are meant to highlight important American holidays or seasonal observances.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Philip Bezanson
item.description: This program features Philip Bezanson's "Homage to Great Americans: Four portraits for woodwind quintets."
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts
